titleStmt.title: The young man's alarum: or, The sad consequences of those sins which are most rife in young men now in these days as swearing, drunkenness, adultery, and the like. [In] a discourse upon the 9th. verse of the 11th. chapter of Ecclesiastes. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Thackery at the Angel in Duck lane,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Copy stained, tightly bound with slight loss of text, cropped at head affecting pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
